# SIAFI Data Science and Machine Learning Handbook

This handbook will guide you through the main concepts and tools used in this course. It is organized as follows:

- Introduction to Data Science
- Machine Learning
- Deep Learning

Please feel free to explore the contents and never stop learning.

You can find the source code for this handbook in the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/emilianodesu/SIAFI-2026-1).
